page.title: 16 Local Churches
page.content: On the 10th of July we went out on a survey, looking at local churches. We saw 7 churches altogether. The first church we saw at the top of the town was St.Nicholas, which is Church of England (C of E). The building is very old with a bell tower. The next church we saw was The Vine Baptist Church and on the corner opposite was The Vine Evangelical Church. This is a much newer church. At the top of St.Johns Hill we passed the United Reform Church, a church with a very high spire. A few minutes later we passed St. Johns Parish Church also C of E, but slightly higher than St.Nicholas. We kept on going until we reached St. Margaret's Catholic Church. We drove back towards the town passed the Methodist Church after which we went back to school.
